item.title: Tinkerer's Guild
item.description: Tinkererâ€™s Guild A guild regulating the distribution and management of Gems within the Deepcrystal Enclave for the purpose of experimentation and development by Inscriptionists and Runeographer.

item.title: Red Devils
item.description: Red Devils A singular, elite squad of the Prismatic Guard consisting entirely of Ruby users. They pride themselves on their combat ability and grit.

item.title: Prismatic Guard
item.description: Prismatic Guard A joint coalition of Arbiters and Shardwalkers developed and deployed by the Trinity Kingdom.

item.title: index
item.description: Gempaign This section of notes is specifically related to a TTRPG campaign run within the Crystalborne setting.

item.title: Crystalborne
item.description: Crystalborne A collection of notes exploring an original setting and documenting a campaign run within the setting.

item.title: Deepcrystal Enclave
item.description: Deepcrystal Enclave The Enclave began as a collection of disjointed settlements in close proximity to the Scar.

item.title: Diamond
item.description: Diamond Power The Intrinsic Power of Diamond allows for manipulating the forces applied to an object.

item.title: Bismuth
item.description: Bismuth Power Bismuth is prized for its Intrinsic Power of morphing physical matter and is responsible for much of the non-hardlight constructions in the Modern era.

item.title: Gem
item.description: Gem A concentrated collection of energy capable of enhancing or empowering both organic and inorganic matter.

item.title: Stoneshire
item.description: Stoneshire A Gem Family powerful enough to found the Trinity Kingdom. They continue to hold seats of power in modern times.
